title: [Infirmary, Hallway]
description: Moonlight through a small, broken window set high on the wall illuminates the hallway.  Through the window you hear the blowing wind and the distant, plaintive cries of gulls.  Faint, krolvin-sized footprints lead away from some stairs.

A small, broken window set high on the wall illuminates the hallway.  Through the window you hear the blowing wind and the distant, plaintive cries of gulls.  Faint, krolvin-sized footprints lead away from some stairs.
